sample.Description: The sample within the EEG data at which an event occurred

Levels.Epoch: Automatically sent at start of recording
Levels.CM_in_range: Automatically sent at start of recording
Levels.STATUS: Sent by task program (except for the very first one, which is sent automatically)

value.Description: The trigger/marker value associated with the event

Levels.61450: onset of pre-stream fixation cross (duration: 1500 ms)
Levels.61463: onset of letter stream; lag 3 trial (duration: 1375 ms)
Levels.61468: onset of letter stream; lag 8 trial (duration: 1375 ms)
Levels.61471: onset of T1 (first target, in red, duration: 91.66 ms)
Levels.61472: onset of T2 (second target, in green duration: 91.66 ms)
Levels.61480: onset of post-stream fixation cross (duration: 1000 ms)
Levels.61490: onset of T1 question ('Which letter was red?')
Levels.61500: onset of T2 question ('Which letter was green?'); T1 question answered incorrectly
Levels.61501: onset of T2 question ('Which letter was green?'); T1 question answered correctly
Levels.61510: onset of post-response fixation cross (duration: 250 ms); T2 question answered incorrectly
Levels.61511: onset of post-response fixation cross (duration: 250 ms); T2 question answered correctly
Levels.61694: trigger to start EEG recording (occurs at start of block after a break)
